thread.title: Kelly Osbourne to Donald Trump: If you kick Latinos who will clean toilets?
thread.title_full: Kelly Osbourne to Donald Trump: If you kick Latinos who will clean toilets? | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Kelly Osbourne to Donald Trump: If you kick Latinos who will clean toilets?
text:
Challenging Donald Trump’s statement about Mexicans, Kelly Osbourne tried to call out the Presidential candidate by asking who will clean his toilet if all the Mexicans were kicked out.
While discussing the Presidential candidate Donald Trump’s lead in the recent polls on ‘The View,’ the 30-year-old singer’s comment was challenged by her co-host Rosie Perez, who later apologised to ‘Shut Up’ hit-maker and tweeted, “My apologizes @KellyOsbourne, I took your point wrong – #TrumpLatinos. My Bad. You’re heart is so pure and righteous. I adore you,” reported TMZ.com.
Replying to her apology, Osbourne wrote that she should have known that she was on a live show and she hopes that this situation would open up a conversation about immigration and the Latin community as a whole.
She added, “by the way I clean my own f**king toilets.”
 05, 2015 8:13 pm
